summary: The module implements a lazy-loading descriptor that attaches custom accessor namespaces to Arkouda objects, along with accessor classes that expose convenient methods for datetime components, string handling, and generic property operations, mirroring pandas-style accessor patterns.
business_intent: To give Arkouda users an intuitive, chainable API for accessing and manipulating datetime and string data, reducing boilerplate and enhancing code readability while maintaining efficient lazy initialization.
